data.name: The Lost Crown: Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
It's the Soundtrack of THE LOST CROWN, in "320kbps MP3's" format. Featuring 35 tracks totaling a little over an hour of eerie atmospheric music.

Recommended to buy. Songs will be downloaded to the The Lost Crown - Original Soundtrack folder in your Steam Directory along with PDF booklet.

Track list:

1. The Lost Crown Theme (01:18)
2. Harbour Cottage (03:00)
3. Saxton Station (01:19)
4. Celtic Corner (03:19)
5. The Bear (02:33)
6. Demons (00:25)
7. The Pinnacles (01:32)
8. Hardacre Chase (01:09)
9. Ghost Hunting (01:15)
10. Bad Omens (00:49)
11. Gruels Antiques (03:22)
12. The Ark (04:39)
13. Northfield Church (01:28)
14. Saxton Streets (02:03)
15. The Agers (00:31)
16. The Gravedigger (02:05)
17. The Vestry (02:40)
18. The Wiccan Kitchen (01:37)
19. A Night At The Museum (01:29)
20. Northfield Crows (01:34)
21. Tree Of Crows (01:52)
22. Lost Afternoon (01:47)
23. Nanny Noah (01:15)
24. Beside The Seaside (00:41)
25. The Museum Films (01:19)
26. The Museum Ghost (02:08)
27. Ulcombe Vaults (00:49)
28. The Ghost Attacks (01:53)
29. Anglo Saxon Kingdom (01:06)
30. Haunted Halls (02:08)
31. Nocturnal Tears (01:33)
32. Raven Lane (01:54)
33. Saxton Shore (02:18)
34. The Cottage Phantom (01:30)
35. The Siren Ghost (00:54)

data.short_description: It's the Soundtrack of THE LOST CROWN, in "320kbps MP3's" format. Featuring 35 tracks totaling a little over an hour of eerie atmospheric music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or newer
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio

data.legal_notice: The Lost Crown © 2008 Jonathan Boakes - Darkling Room. Developed by Jonathan Boakes - Darkling Room. Licensed exclusively worldwide to and published by Iceberg Interactive B.V. All brands, product names, and logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners. All rights reserved. Made in England.
